title: Meet the Team Behind Ripples

subHeading1.title: OurMission
subHeading1.description: To empower businesses with innovative tools and automation for effortless and sustainable growth, reducing CAC, and boosting revenue.

subHeading2.title: OurVision
subHeading2.description: To lead eCommerce innovation globally, inspiring success stories. We aim to provide every business, big or small, the resources and support to achieve their dreams.

description1: Our founders bring extensive experience from top D2C consumer tech platforms, uniting to create something truly extraordinary.
